name: Decent
headline: One-click transactions using any token across chains.
description:
Decent's core product,[The Box](https://decent.xyz/), enables 1-click transactions using any token across chains.  For example, a user can purchase an Optimism NFT off primary or secondary sales using USDC on Arbitrum.

As applications splinter across an increasing number of rollups and app chains, wallets and dapps will have to meet users at their point of liquidity vs. expecting users to jump through hoops to arrive with tokens on the correct network.
tags: industry:developer-tools; industry:crypto-web3; industry:b2b; industry:nft; industry:cryptocurrency; location:new-york

founders.name: Charlie Durbin, Founder
founders.description:
crypto trading models --> music investment banking -//-> Decent
ChainForest; OrangeDAO; FWB

founders.name: Alexander Carlson, Founder
founders.description: Music Producer, Singer (Forester), Econ Head, Crypto Enthusiast

founders.name: Will Collier, Founder
founders.description: Will Collier is a co-founder of Decent. He graduated from Brown University in 2020 with a double major in Economics and Architecture. Following graduation, Will co-founded The Farmlink Project, a food rescue organization that won a Congressional Medal of Honor Service Award in 2021.  Previously, Will worked as a consultant at Accenture, covering the firm's Media & Entertainment and Software & Platforms clients.

founders.name: Will Kantaros, Founder
founders.description: Building decent.xyz, math cs econ @ Brown, previously SWE @ mongo.db, blockchain + poker enthusiast

# Accept any crypto, grow your revenue and users.
One API for instant cross-chain swaps and chain abstracted transactions.
Meet your users where they are. Don't leave transactions on the table.

# Get up and running in minutes.
Decent's no-code tools and simple APIs are the easiest way to build cross-chain transactions into your dApp - and it's free to get started!
##### [Decent Console + Dashboards Paste in your contract parameters, copy the starter code into your app, and go! Set your own fees, track revenue & transaction information in real-time dashboards, and grow your business with ease. Enjoy crypto development on easy mode. ![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/3e6758sKcBvwfvL1ioxS4okv8Ew.png)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/sIBXYRo0SeWQFbCZVPkWqE8XOE.png?scale-down-to=2048)](https://www.decent.xyz/<https:/console.decent.xyz/>)##### [Point of Sale The best transaction UX in crypto is also the easiest to set up. Drop in our React component or build your own UI with our APIs and hooks. ![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/PQJwjX41EYy7vCvODWSAXydqrd4.png?scale-down-to=512)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/vuAv6OUtN76h1LV64Ts5ITy4LcU.png?scale-down-to=512)](https://www.decent.xyz/<https:/docs.decent.xyz/development/sdk-reference/the-box/point-of-sale>)##### [OnboardingEnable users to instantly fill their accounts with existing crypto assets without leaving your app.![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/jO812v1A0mIULiQuoHZ1S9eTt8.png?scale-down-to=1024)](https://www.decent.xyz/<https:/docs.decent.xyz/development/sdk-reference/the-box/onboarding-modal>)##### [Bridge & Swap Support for any network on its first day. Deliver best price execution for swaps between any token on any network. ![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/qpqjNVCdNZnaU6ygM4BKfI0muI.png?scale-down-to=512)](https://www.decent.xyz/<https:/docs.decent.xyz/development/sdk-reference/the-box/swap-modal>)##### [Decent App Instantly swap between thousands of tokens on dozens of chains. Explore featured destination actions.Swap tokens instantly across any chain Decent supports with the best price quotes sourced from any DEX and top bridges.![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/QqbEgx1GZexfEwEQ3koh4ApKY.png?scale-down-to=512)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/lLUZKdTrWY0RzIdci9L5k2Q.png?scale-down-to=512)![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/lLUZKdTrWY0RzIdci9L5k2Q.png?scale-down-to=512)](https://www.decent.xyz/<https:/app.decent.xyz/>)
##### Decent App 
Swap tokens instantly across any chain Decent supports with the best price quotes sourced from any DEX and top bridges.

**The Decent Console removes all complexity from implementing and managing your transaction experiences.**
_Build on easy mode_ with our **no-code Playground**. Just copy and paste starter code into your app for easy implementation of any Decent product.
_Earn and split fees on every transaction_. Use the **Fee Manager** to set custom fees in your applications.View **transaction and user analytics** for _real-time visibility_ into your application, so that you can make smarter, more informed decisions.

# Serious teams use Decent.
Industry leaders and companies that mean business choose Decent.
Industry leaders and companies that mean business choose Decent.
Industry leaders and companies that mean business choose Decent.
  * ![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/BnVmAs1ld6BeFPlHyzjlErMQdc.jpg)
Theo
Lead Developer, Zora
I built this [cross-chain transaction] feature with Decent, and have got to say the process was soo smooth! The transaction builder / playground in the Decent Console is too good!
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/MWgjkcuhZwWT4ZDg1mgK9SFFY.jpg)
Squinch
Head of Product, Doodles
At Doodles we needed a fast, reliable solution to implement onchain crypto payments for our in-app packs. Excellent UX, quick transaction time, and token optionality for our users was really important for us. Working with Decent allowed us to fit their tech into our previously existing stack incredibly quickly and their assistance in meeting our rigorous requirements was always met with enthusiasm and solution driven thinking.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/5nnroN6uAo1rTZvoHebH6WepY.jpg)
Forrest
Head of BD, Conduit
Modern crypto apps must be able to onboard new users from anywhere. Decent has an all-in-one onboarding suite that can be added to any app in a few lines of code!
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/ReZcUgAwaCuhrmxcmM4nDiTdz8.png)
Isaac
Cofounder, Agave.gg & Verilink
The Decent Console, fee splitting, and onramp / offramp compatibility makes Decent an amazing PoS solution and crypto payment system for any developer. To us, the most valuable has been the coverage and the ability to specify the toAmount early on. Also, getting the token price and status of a transaction are key value adds in order for us to accomplish [our build].


## Start Building with Decent
Get started for free now!
[Start Building](https://www.decent.xyz/<https:/console.decent.xyz/>)

generated_description:
### Overview of Decent

**Decent** is a New York-based startup that emerged from Y Combinator's W22 batch in 2021. With a lean team of just eight employees, Decent is making strides in the complex world of cryptocurrency and cross-chain transactions.

### Mission

Decent aims to simplify the cryptocurrency experience for users by enabling one-click transactions using any token across multiple blockchain networks. They understand the pain points that users face when trying to transfer tokens between different blockchains, and their solution is designed to meet users at their point of liquidity rather than forcing them to navigate a convoluted pathway.

### Core Product

Decent’s flagship product, **The Box**, allows users to execute these seamless transactions effortlessly. For instance, users can purchase an Optimism NFT using USDC on the Arbitrum network, integrating a smooth user experience across various platforms.

### Key Features & Use Cases

- **Cross-Chain Functionality**: Decent provides an API for instant swaps and transactions that are not limited by the underlying blockchain's constraints.
- **Developer Tools**: Their no-code tools and simple APIs help developers incorporate cross-chain transactions into their decentralized applications (dApps) without extensive coding knowledge.
- **User Onboarding**: Decent facilitates user onboarding, enabling users to fill their accounts with existing crypto assets directly within apps.
- **Transaction Insights**: The Decent Console offers real-time analytics, allowing developers to track revenue, set custom fees, and enhance user experiences.

### Achievements

- Over **$400 million** in in-app transactions have been facilitated through their platform, and apps utilizing Decent have seen transaction growth exceeding **40%**.
  
### Industry Position

With tags like 'developer-tools,' 'crypto-web3,' and 'NFT,' Decent positions itself as an essential resource for both developers and businesses looking to navigate the evolving landscape of cryptocurrency transactions. They have garnered trust from notable partners and industry players, building a reputation for reliability and ease of use.

### Testimonials

Clients like Zora, Doodles, and Conduit have praised Decent for its robust features and straightforward integration process. These endorsements underline the platform's effectiveness and the value it adds to existing systems.

### Call to Action

If you're a developer looking to enhance your application with cross-chain capabilities or a business wanting to streamline your crypto transactions, Decent offers a promising solution. You can start building today at [decent.xyz](https://www.decent.xyz).

---

Decent is not just making crypto “decent”—they're setting the stage for where the future of transactional integrity meets user-centric design across the blockchain landscape.
